attributes.action: Make Monday a weekend day for schools
attributes.additional_details: Many children despise Mondays and need an extra day off for reduced stress and anxiety.
attributes.background: Reduce the school week from 5 days to 4 days and make Monday the weekend day

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for a similar action: "Reduce the school week to four days a week" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727514

Young Minds provides practical advice on mental health and wellbeing, and how to get support: https://www.youngminds.org.uk/
